sentences.en: A spokeswoman said the agreement had been declared null and void.
sentences.cn: 女发言人称该协议已宣布无效。

sentences.en: All space - directions are void.
sentences.cn: 四大皆空.

sentences.en: And thus far it was a life: in the void.
sentences.cn: 他们已在共同工作着,这便是生活 —— 一种空虚中的生活.

sentences.en: Below him was nothing but a black void.
sentences.cn: 他下面只是一片漆黑。

sentences.en: He is confident the backroom can step into the temporary void.
sentences.cn: 他确信原先的幕后智囊能够填补暂时的空缺。

sentences.en: he original elections were declared void by the former military ruler.
sentences.cn: 原来的选举被前军事首领宣布为无效。

sentences.en: Her eyes were void of all expression.
sentences.cn: 她的眼神一片茫然。

sentences.en: His death has left the void.
sentences.cn: 他的去世留下了这个空位.

sentences.en: His suggestions are totally void of common sense.
sentences.cn: 他的建议完全缺乏常识.

sentences.en: Suddenly the street was void of people.
sentences.cn: 街道上突然间空无一人.

sentences.en: The agreement was declared void ab initio.
sentences.cn: 此协议自一开始就被宣布无效。

sentences.en: The agreement was declared void.
sentences.cn: 该协议已宣布无效。

sentences.en: The amusement park will fill a void in this town, which has little entertainment for children.
sentences.cn: 这个游乐场将填补这座小城儿童娱乐设施匮乏的空白。

sentences.en: The contract is void.
sentences.cn: 这契约无效.

sentences.en: The office fell void.
sentences.cn: 这个职位空着.

sentences.en: The ship moved silently through the black void.
sentences.cn: 船静悄悄地划过漆黑的夜。

sentences.en: The treaty has been declared void.
sentences.cn: 条约被宣布无效.

sentences.en: The treaty is now void of absolute commitments.
sentences.cn: 条约现在失去了绝对的约束力。

sentences.en: There was an aching void in his heart.
sentences.cn: 他心中有悲痛的空虚感.

sentences.en: void spaces
sentences.cn: 空位

phrases.tran_cn: 孔隙率；含气率；[材料]气穴
空隙度；孔隙量；孔隙容积；空孔率，空洞率
空隙率；空隙分数；空隙组分
adj. 没有的，缺乏的；没有…的

trans.tran_cn: 空的，空虚的，没人住的，（职位）空缺着的，无效的
trans.tran_en: a contract or official agreement that is void is not legal and has no effect

trans.tran_cn: 太空，宇宙空间，空位，空隙，空虚感，寂寞的心情
trans.tran_en: a feeling of great sadness that you have when someone you love dies or when something is taken from you
to make a contract or agreement void so that it has no legal effect

trans.tran_cn: 使无效，宣布…作废，取消，排泄
trans.tran_en: to make a contract or agreement void so that it has no legal effect
